title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 860.7 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 860.7 - Application

State Regulations

These regulations shall apply to the interstate nontidal
streams of the Delaware River Basin. The interstate nontidal streams of the

Delaware River Basin are those rivers, lakes, and other waters that flow across
or form a part of State boundaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
860.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
